name: Flesh them out
description:
The curse of flesh once again pester the lands. it's up to the youngest member of the bone clan to flesh out the flesh!

Effects and sounds are from unity asset store Action RPG FX

Most proud of asset: " The 2d skull"

Thing that didn't make it: -Player character takes damage from enemies, -Rigging failed succesfully so animations are all made in unity with animation rigging, -NPC attacks with hayforks, -Better camera(One of my first times using cinemachine  for the camera), -overall polish.
